title: 85/240/EEC: Commission Decision of 15 April 1985 concerning health protection measures against foot-and-mouth disease in respect of certain fresh meat from Argentina
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 15 April 1985
concerning health protection measures against foot-and-mouth disease in respect of certain fresh meat from Argentina
(85/240/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: Member States shall prohibit from 15 May 1985 the introduction into the territory of the Community of offal of bovine animals including bovine lungs from Argentina.
The Commission will keep the situation under review and this Decision may be amended in the light of developments therein.
The Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 15 April 1985.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
